message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at $9,000?
Bob, I understand you're on a budget.  While I can't meet your $9,000 offer, I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is still a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $10,000?
